column3:
体力が一定以下の状態で体力が０になる
ダメージを受けた時、１度だけ体力１で踏み止まる
宿での休憩やログアウトにより効果は回復する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に発動体力条件がより緩和</COL>
column4:
Allows you to survive an attack with 1 HP
remaining when struck by an attack that would
kill you while below a certain amount of health.
Effect resets on logging out or resting at
an inn.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases health threshold for
effect to trigger.</COL>
